description: Does not load up so unable to give any further info.
Test this stuff before the link is available to users!

I'm using Ubuntu 18.04.
This piqued my interest since I have used Flight Radar 24 for several years.

Predictably, and as suggested by other reviewers, this does NOT work.
I explored the Snap folders - they were empty so it was no surprise the software wouldn't run.

I don't know, but I imagine the developer of this Snap product tried to create a "mini browser" or something that would ONLY go to the web site.


Anyway, moving on to things that DO work - and I have NO connection in anyway to the following.
I simply watch them from time to time..

If you are interested in following civilian aircraft (almost) all over the world, simply go to :-
https://www.flightradar24.com
This is the home of Flight Radar 24, and the site that I have been using for many years.
It is free to use in half hour chunks. Just reload the page when your time is up.

If you are interested in Shipping, I also watch Marine Traffic :-
https://www.marinetraffic.com
This is similar to the aircraft site - it is free for half hour chunks to prevent people using their bandwidth by leaving it open all day. 

I hope this brings some entertainment to some of you, to make up for the disappointment trying to use this useless Snap.

Thisisi
summary: Doesn't work - but you can still access the site
